extendedInfo.description: CAQ is a revolutionary way to study, by creating a quiz on the topics that you need to know, and then taking it, helping you learn in an easy way.Not studying? CAQ is still great for coming up with trivia quizzes to share with your friends and colleagues. The export feature means that you can share your quizzes and take them at the same time on multiple devices.Free features;â¢ Create up to 6 quizzesâ¢ Create up to 11 questions per quizâ¢ Import quizzesâ¢ Use both the dark and light theme(3.0+)â¢ Shuffle your quizzesâ¢ Four types of question;         - Multiple Choice         - Standard Question(written answer)         - Picture Question         - Multiple Choice Picture Question Full features(available through CAQ key);â¢ Export Quizzesâ¢ Create an infinite number of quizzesâ¢ Create an infinite number of questions per quizâ¢ Backup your quizzes automatically â¢ The ability to restore any accidentally deleted quizzesâ¢ Remove adsFeatures in progress:â¢ Export as a word document so you can print your quizzes and do them on paperâ¢ Multiple Choice Picture Questionsâ¢ Questions worth multiple marksâ¢ Questions with complicated mark schemes (to let you give your quizzes more of a 'test' feel)Questions? Bugs? Feature Requests? Send me an email and I will do my best to respond(if it is a bug report please include as much information as possible).IMPORTANT NOTE - I have noticed some crashes recently, but cannot reproduce them. If your quiz starts crashing and you have purchased the key, please send me an email with your quiz exported so I can reproduce the problem. Permissions - Internet: Used for ads, nothing else, if you buy the pro key this is not usedRead/Write on internal storage: this is for importing and exporting quizzes, making and restoring backups, and saving picturesTags; Create A Quiz, Custom Quiz, Make your own Quiz, Custom test, Make a test, Quiz Maker,

reviews.title: Revolutionary App
reviews.comment: Can you add this style of questions also -   Question & Answer (only one)  - No Choices -  Press a Button, to reveal the answer type .  This will be helpful to test the memory power
reviews.author: Kranthi Kumar Sesham

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: This app has so many great uses, self-study education, training or just messsing around is great fun too.   Awesome!  The dev is a great guy too - always really helpful with fast response.
reviews.author: Russell Forrest

reviews.title: One of the best apps for educational purposes
reviews.comment: Excellent App.  Keep up the good work. The creator always gets back to me with answers to my questions
reviews.author: liban mahamud

reviews.title: Nice! Only 2 problems so far..
reviews.comment: Please allow the forward slash (/) character to be used in questions, answers and quiz names, also please allow numbers in quiz names, thanks!  App was purchased right away, and I\'m pleased so far, except for the above issues.
reviews.author: James Cochran

reviews.title: great app
reviews.comment: I stumble upon this app and immediately bought the license key as I was preparing for my kid\'s test. however, is it possible to add a popup box for like an explanation of the answer or where the answer was referenced from. Great app, though the color of UI is dull
reviews.author: carlos ibanez

reviews.title: Woodruff is the man!!!
reviews.comment: Great app! Perfect tool to prepare for a test or perfect tool to give to your students!
reviews.author: Dehmon Martinez

reviews.title: Good for reviewing
reviews.comment: Now it only needs to create a summary of the wrong answers and would be perfect!
reviews.author: Alejandro Ramirez

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Helped me a lot would be perfect if the quiz questions could pop up in a random order

reviews.title: worst but in layout ever
reviews.comment: who in the hell would put the delete a quiz right next to add question I spent two hours making a test and all got deleted only because the layout is so terrible....I thought this would help me instead it wastes my time do not install if are not ready to lose your progress

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: After I made a quiz, it cut off the questions.  How can I know the answer if I can\'t see all of the question?
reviews.author: Zeph Gonzalez

reviews.title: Not my taste
reviews.comment: I feel that it\'s kind of a waste, because you have to upgrade if you want anything worth downloading. I feel they cut the free version too much, especially if you want to put having ads in the free version as well into the equation.
reviews.author: Jen Bosas

reviews.title: Excellent for study
reviews.comment: I have my exams comming up soon, and this app is very useful. Could you add picture support? It would make this app a lot more useful.
reviews.author: Bill Sparks

reviews.title: Ridiculous
reviews.comment: Ad is in the way when you are inputting questions, right in the middle of the box you\'re writing in
reviews.author: Jimmy Ingram

reviews.title: Good app but . . .
reviews.comment: It\'s a good app except when I make a mistake and I erase it just repeats what I already have!!! Plz fix therefore I only put two stars -.-
reviews.author: Tristian Delgado

reviews.title: Excellent idea
reviews.comment: A tool to create the quiz from a computer would be nice. Ability for longer answers too. Good job
